H0.text: who is the president of usa right now. Joe Biden

H1.text: who is the president of usa right now. Mike Pence

H2.text: who is the president of usa right now. Kamala Harris

H3.text: who is the president of usa right now. Donald Trump

A4.text: Biden was inaugurated as the 46th president of the United States on January 20, 2021. At 78, he was then the oldest person to assume the office up to that point.

A5.text: After the Capitol was cleared, Congress officially counted the election results, with Pence, in his role as president of the Senate, announcing Biden and Harris as the winners.
